text: No es bueno que el hombre esté solo is a 1973 Spanish drama film directed by Pedro Olea. It is composed by Alfonso G. Santisteban. ==Cast== * Carmen Sevilla as Lina * José Luis López Vázquez as Martín * Máximo Valverde as Mauro * Eduardo Fajardo as Don Alfonso * José Franco as Dario * Helga Liné as Mónica * Lolita Merino as Cati * Raquel Rodrigo as Mujer de club * Betsabé Ruiz as Chica de club * Enrique Ferpi as Cliente de club * José Riesgo as Agente * Ángel Menéndez as Ingeniero ==References== ==External links== * Category:1973 films Category:Spanish-language films Category:Spanish drama films Category:Spanish films Category:Films directed by Pedro Olea Category:Films with screenplays by José Luis Garci Category:Films shot in Spain
title: No es bueno que el hombre esté solo
